title: Curse of First Blood

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
If you are attacked first, counter the attack with a modkill level attack and steal their role. You lose Modkill attack and defense upon doing so.
If you die first via hanging, you automatically revive, steal a random role contrary to the majority of the game, and kill all your guilty voters.
If you do not die first, you become a jester (Post 90).

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Die first, then win with your new win-con
